faq.headline: Here at HiFi Horizon, our trained product specialists aim to provide the right product for you. We take great care with all of our orders to ensure you are fully happy with the product.
faq.subheading: We aim to resolve any problems to your satisfaction. Please contact us directly, if, for any reason, you have an issue with your order, your product or any other service provided.

sections.subtitle: Our Guarantee
sections.body:
All items excluding ex-display and secondhand goods are covered by at least 12 months warranty; this is detailed on your receipt. Any secondhand or ex-display product is covered by at least 3 months warranty as noted in the original listing.

HiFi Horizon cannot guarantee against any misuse (i.e. blown speakers etc.), commercial use, wear and tear, erosion of parts, loss of data stored on any form of writeable/hard drive devices, dead pixels of an amount not covered by the manufacturer's specifications or where you have not allowed repairs of goods to be carried out by authorised agents. If it has been more than 30 days since you have received a product and discovered a fault, we will still repair the goods free of charge or, if you prefer, replace them provided that you report the fault within 12 months of purchase. If we are unable to repair or replace the item(s) we will provide you with a full refund instead.

Please note that if it is after the initial 30 days of purchase you must be able to certify the fault was present upon delivery and not by misuse.

sections.subtitle: Shipping
sections.body:
To return your product, you should mail your product to:

2 Joppa Road, Mackenzie House, Edinburgh, EH15 2EU.

If you would like to return an item, please note that we cannot arrange a collection of the item without additional cost; you will be responsible for ensuring the product reaches us. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund. Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary. We will process the refund when the item arrives with us.

If you are shipping an item over £100, we would advise using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We cannot guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

sections.subtitle: Delivery
sections.body:
Please check the condition of all products delivered as soon as they are received. This does not affect your statutory rights. If there is a problem we would like to deal with this as soon as possible to alleviate any inconvenience to yourself.

As soon as we have delivered the goods to you, you will be responsible for them and any damage occasioned whilst in your possession. The majority of goods we send will require you to sign for them upon delivery. If you are not able to sign for a delivery, we will do our utmost to contact you to arrange when it is convenient to redeliver. Our responsibility for everything other than damage due to our negligence will end at the time the carrier tried to delivery the goods to you. If your product is visibly damaged in transit, please sign for the delivery as ‘damaged' and let us know as soon as possible.

sections.subtitle: Refunds
sections.body:
Once your returned item is received and inspected, we will send you an email or phone call to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your original method of payment, within 3 working days. Please note we require an email address or contact number to arrange a refund that was purchased over the phone. There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted or we cannot refund you; Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error. Any damage that has been caused by misuse, such as a speaker drive unit being blown or water being introduced to the unit, or that has been damaged due to poor packing. Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery. In any instance, we will notify you as soon as possible to resolve this matter.

If you haven't received a refund after confirmation, first check your bank account again. Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted. Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time of a couple of days before a refund is posted. If you have done all of this and you still have not received your refund after 7 days, please contact us at sales@hifi-horizon.com. 

#### Sale Items

Only regularly priced items may be refunded, unfortunately clearance, special order and outlet items cannot be refunded unless they are found to be faulty on arrival. For more details about returning secondhand or sale items, please contact sales@hifi-horizon.com.

sections.subtitle: Returns Process
sections.body:
If you wish to return goods purchased online or over the phone, you should notify HiFi Horizon of your intention to do so within 14 days of the date of receipt.

You then have an additional 14 days to return the goods from this notification date (goods must be returned within 28 days). We will in such circumstances refund you the cost of your order, excluding postage or delivery cost. However, if goods are not returned 'as new' due to excessive handling on your part, or with components missing (including packing materials and manuals) we may make a reasonable deduction for this. Please do not send your product back to the manufacturer. We kindly ask that to make the refund process easier, that you include your receipt or proof of purchase and a cover letter detailing briefly why the item is being returned. We cannot refund the cost of delivery fees if there was an additional charge, only the cost of the goods themselves. We will process the refund when the item arrives with us. If you are shipping an item over £100, we would advise using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We cannot guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Please contact us before attempting to return your goods. For purchases bought in-store, you can also drop in and be refunded instantly. 

#### Exchanges

We can only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange the product for the same item due to a fault, please first send us an email at sales@hifi-horizon.com and once approved, send your item to:

HiFi Horizon, 2 Joppa Road, Mackenzie House, Portobello, Edinburgh, EH15 2EU.

Please also include the proof of purchase and a cover letter detailing the reason for exchange.

about.title: History
about.subtitle: Established in the late 1960s, our family owned business is based in Edinburgh and Falkirk, but services customers across the UK.
about.body:
Our Edinburgh branch has the longest history as an audio retailer in the UK. During recent renovations, receipts were found from Nicolson's Gramophone Saloon dating back to 1926. In the 1950s WG Graham took over the shop and renamed it WG Graham's HiFi Corner. Upon his retirement, Graham Tiso bought the business and modernized the name to HiFi Horizon.

Soon thereafter a young enthusiastic Colin MacKenzie (left), who was recommended by Linn's own Ivor Tiefenbrun, was employed to manage the shop; with a knack for business and years of experience in the hi-fi industry, Colin would later become the owner of HiFi Horizon.

Today, Struan MacKenzie carries on the legacy as the company's Managing Director.

about.title: Hear The Difference
about.subtitle: Book a demonstration at our Edinburgh or Falkirk showrooms.
about.body:
Would you choose a quality car without a test drive? If you are familiar with the brand and have great trust in it, you might. However, our listening preferences are unique to the individual and with many of our customers new to the world of high quality sound and vision, we encourage everyone to come in to demonstrate the products they are interested in. You'll find a relaxing and comfortable environment in both our Edinburgh and Falkirk premises where you can decide for yourself if the kit is right for you. We also offer home demonstrations on selected products.

It's our aim to get the right product for you.

Our experts are on hand to guide you through the differences between speakers, amplifiers and sources and provide simple solutions that suit your needs.

about.title: Services
about.subtitle: Our passion for the products we sell and, for our customers' satisfaction simply means that we happily offer additional services not found on the high-street.
about.body:
**Home Setup** - We want to ensure that the equipment you've purchased from us is installed correctly and sounds perfect; and we happily provide this service throughout the UK.

**Part Exchange** - To help you upgrade your system, we offer our part-exchange program. We can offer a set price, or sell your old kit on your behalf.

**Turntable Doctor** - Our turntable experts have been trained by the manufacturers for initial setup, long-term maintenance, and upgrading your high quality turntables.

**Record Cleaning Service** - Have some old records that need a bit of love? We offer Scotland's very own professional record cleaning service with our bespoke Pro-Ject record cleaner.

about.title: Tailored For You
about.subtitle: We look forward to customising a system to meet your needs.
about.body:
We don't favour one manufacturer over another - the only thing we do favour is making sure our customers get the right product that suits their needs and listening preferences. We will ask many questions in order to ensure that what you buy from us is tailored to you and you alone.

If you are looking for a product not found in our demonstration showrooms or our online site, don't fret as we have access to hundreds of brands.

One of our biggest pleasures of working in this industry is to see the smile on our customers' faces when they finally hear and see the system of their dreams.

products.name: Classic Cd
products.shortDescription: Pristine audio reproduction for CD enthusiasts.
products.longDescription: Immerse yourself in pristine audio with this top-tier CD player, designed for exceptional clarity and dynamic range. Every note is reproduced with stunning accuracy, revealing subtle nuances you've never heard before.

products.name: Destiny Cd
products.shortDescription: Next-level CD playback with enhanced clarity.
products.longDescription: Experience your music collection anew with this advanced CD player. Its superior decoding and playback capabilities deliver an expansive soundstage and breathtaking detail, making every listening session an event.

products.name: Evo Cd
products.shortDescription: Audiophile-grade CD player for discerning ears.
products.longDescription: This audiophile-grade CD player elevates your listening experience with its precise engineering. Enjoy rich, vibrant sound and an unparalleled level of musicality, bringing your favorite artists directly into your living room.

products.name: 2010S Cd
products.shortDescription: Unleash full CD potential with dynamic sound.
products.longDescription: Unleash the full potential of your CDs with this high-performance player. It offers exceptional sonic purity and a wide dynamic range, ensuring every track is rendered with authenticity and emotional impact.

products.name: Classic
products.shortDescription: Premium DVD player for immersive visuals and audio.
products.longDescription: Step into a world of immersive entertainment with this versatile DVD player. It delivers stunning visual fidelity and audiophile-grade sound, making it perfect for both movies and music playback.

products.name: 2010S
products.shortDescription: Crisp video and detailed sound from this DVD player.
products.longDescription: Experience crystal-clear video and rich, detailed audio with this high-quality DVD player. Its robust design ensures reliable performance, bringing your favorite films and concerts to life with exceptional precision.

products.name: D200
products.shortDescription: Home theater essential: superb DVD and audio.
products.longDescription: This meticulously engineered DVD player is a cornerstone for any home theater, delivering vibrant images and a nuanced sound profile. Enjoy every scene and every soundtrack with unparalleled depth and clarity.

products.name: Halod3
products.shortDescription: Cinematic audio and video with this DVD player.
products.longDescription: Unlock a truly cinematic experience with this premium DVD player. Its advanced processing ensures stunning video playback and a captivating audio performance, making it an essential component for discerning viewers.

products.name: A50I
products.shortDescription: Powerful integrated amp for dynamic audio.
products.longDescription: This integrated amplifier is a powerhouse of sound, combining robust power with refined control. It delivers a dynamic and detailed audio experience, perfect for bringing out the best in your speakers.

products.name: Classic5350Se
products.shortDescription: Pure sound and powerful performance in one unit.
products.longDescription: Experience pure audio bliss with this integrated amplifier, crafted for sonic purity and powerful performance. Its meticulous design ensures a clean signal path and exceptional clarity across all frequencies.

products.name: Destinyamp
products.shortDescription: Rich, full-bodied sound from this integrated amp.
products.longDescription: This integrated amplifier provides the perfect blend of power and finesse, delivering a rich, full-bodied sound that will transform your listening space. Its intuitive controls make it a joy to operate.

products.name: Snapper
products.shortDescription: Unleash your audio system's true potential.
products.longDescription: Unlock the true potential of your audio system with this robust integrated amplifier. It offers exceptional headroom and a wide dynamic range, ensuring your music is delivered with impact and precision.

products.name: Stingray
products.shortDescription: Uncompromising sound quality for audiophiles.
products.longDescription: This integrated amplifier is engineered for audio enthusiasts who demand uncompromising sound quality. Its sophisticated circuitry provides a captivating listening experience, revealing every nuance of your favorite tracks.

products.name: Mahi
products.shortDescription: Authoritative power for demanding speakers.
products.longDescription: Drive your speakers to their full potential with this exceptionally powerful amplifier. Designed for stability and sonic purity, it delivers an authoritative and transparent sound, even with the most challenging loads.

products.name: Neoclassic300B
products.shortDescription: Unadulterated audio performance power amp.
products.longDescription: This power amplifier is built to deliver unadulterated audio performance. Its massive power reserves and pristine signal reproduction ensure every note is rendered with stunning dynamics and incredible accuracy.

products.name: Haloa23
products.shortDescription: Precision and strength for ultimate audio.
products.longDescription: Designed for the ultimate audio experience, this power amplifier combines raw strength with delicate precision. It renders complex musical passages effortlessly, providing an unparalleled sense of realism and impact.

products.name: Obh 22 Passive Preamp
products.shortDescription: Refined control and transparent signal path.
products.longDescription: Take command of your audio with this precision preamplifier. Its transparent signal path and versatile connectivity options allow you to tailor your sound with exceptional clarity and control.

products.name: Classic7100
products.shortDescription: Pristine audio signal with dynamic control.
products.longDescription: This preamplifier is the cornerstone of a high-fidelity system, offering impeccable signal integrity and dynamic control. It ensures that every sonic detail is preserved, delivering a pure and engaging listening experience.

products.name: Halop3
products.shortDescription: Advanced preamplifier for crystal-clear sound.
products.longDescription: Unlock the full potential of your audio components with this sophisticated preamplifier. Its advanced design minimizes noise and distortion, resulting in a remarkably clean, dynamic, and lifelike sound.

products.name: Prebox
products.shortDescription: Audiophile-grade preamp for ultimate purity.
products.longDescription: Refine your sound with this audiophile-grade preamplifier, offering precise volume control and pristine signal amplification. It's the ideal choice for demanding listeners seeking ultimate sonic purity.

products.name: Debut III Blue
products.shortDescription: Rediscover vinyl with this elegant turntable.
products.longDescription: Revisit your vinyl collection with this exquisitely crafted record player. It delivers a rich, warm, and detailed sound that truly captures the essence of analog audio, making every spin a nostalgic journey.

products.name: Debut III Red
products.shortDescription: Precision-engineered turntable for vibrant sound.
products.longDescription: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of vinyl with this beautifully designed turntable. Its precision engineering ensures accurate tracking and a vibrant, lifelike sound that will delight any audiophile.

products.name: Debut III Yellow
products.shortDescription: Authentic analog experience with stunning design.
products.longDescription: Bring your vinyl records to life with this exceptional turntable. It combines elegant aesthetics with high-fidelity performance, offering a deeply engaging and authentic analog listening experience.

products.name: RPM 5
products.shortDescription: Robust turntable for pristine vinyl playback.
products.longDescription: This sophisticated turntable is a testament to analog excellence, delivering a pristine and detailed sound from your vinyl collection. Its robust construction ensures optimal playback and minimal resonance.

products.name: RPM 10
products.shortDescription: High-performance turntable for ultimate detail.
products.longDescription: Discover the true magic of vinyl with this high-performance turntable. It meticulously extracts every detail from your records, providing an incredibly dynamic and emotionally resonant listening journey.

products.name: Vcs Wall
products.shortDescription: Room-filling sound from these premium speakers.
products.longDescription: Fill your space with breathtaking audio from these premium loudspeakers. Engineered for acoustic perfection, they deliver a wide soundstage, precise imaging, and powerful, yet articulate bass.

products.name: M5
products.shortDescription: Masterfully crafted loudspeakers for realism.
products.longDescription: Experience music the way it was meant to be heard with these masterfully crafted loudspeakers. They reproduce every instrument and vocal with stunning realism, drawing you deeper into your favorite tracks.

products.name: Hl7Es2
products.shortDescription: Disappearing speakers, leaving only the music.
products.longDescription: These loudspeakers are designed to disappear, leaving only the music. Their exceptional clarity and natural tonal balance create an immersive listening experience, revealing the true essence of your recordings.

products.name: Monitor30
products.shortDescription: Concert hall sound from high-fidelity speakers.
products.longDescription: Transform your room into a concert hall with these high-fidelity loudspeakers. They boast an expansive dynamic range and incredible detail, delivering a truly captivating and emotionally resonant audio performance.

products.name: P3Es2
products.shortDescription: Compact power, redefining sonic excellence.
products.longDescription: These compact yet powerful loudspeakers redefine sonic excellence. Their ability to reproduce intricate musical textures and deep, articulate bass will surprise and delight even the most discerning audiophiles.

products.name: Jd102B
products.shortDescription: Warm, rich sound with vintage tube character.
products.longDescription: Indulge in the unmistakable warmth and rich harmonics of this classic tube amplifier. It imparts a delightful vintage character to your music, adding depth and emotion to every note.

products.name: Jd202A
products.shortDescription: Captivating audio, lush analog feel.
products.longDescription: This tube amplifier offers a truly captivating audio experience, with its signature warm and inviting sound. It brings a new dimension to your music, enhancing clarity and adding a lush, analog feel.

products.name: Jd300B
products.shortDescription: Legendary tube sound for engaging listening.
products.longDescription: Experience the legendary tube sound with this exquisite amplifier. Its rich, fluid presentation and natural dynamics create an incredibly engaging and fatigue-free listening experience that will keep you captivated.

products.name: Jd302B
products.shortDescription: Timeless tube audio with natural soundstage.
products.longDescription: This tube amplifier is a testament to timeless audio engineering, delivering a beautifully natural and expansive soundstage. It brings out the soul of your music, with a warmth and realism that digital simply can't replicate.

products.name: Jd502B
products.shortDescription: Immersive tube amplifier, detailed and musical.
products.longDescription: Dive into the captivating world of tube audio with this remarkable amplifier. Its smooth, articulate sound and impressive power output create an immersive listening experience that's both detailed and wonderfully musical.
